message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product for a competitive price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $11000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer, but $9800 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking of a price of $10500. It's a fair price that I think you'll find reasonable.

I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, which is the maximum I can afford. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10000. I'm willing to meet you at $10500, but I'm also keeping the option to sell it to John for $10000, so I'm going to make a slightly higher counteroffer of $10700. This is my final offer for now.
